SEARCH
Package com.financial.multi_year_analysis

Class MultiYearEntity

java.lang.Object
com.financial.multi_year_analysis.MultiYearEntity
public class MultiYearEntity extends Object
Represents an organizational entity (such as a government department, agency, or organization) that has associated budget expenses tracked across multiple years. This class provides methods to analyze total, regular, and public investment expenses per year.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Financial Analysis System

  • Field Details

    • multiYearExpensesOfEntity

    • multiYearEntities

  • Constructor Details

    • MultiYearEntity

      public MultiYearEntity(String entityCode, String entityName)
      Constructs a new MultiYearEntity and automatically links it with its associated expenses. The entity is registered in the global entities collection for later retrieval. Note: The multiYearExpensesOfEntity parameter is overridden by expenses loaded from the expense collection based on entityCode.
      Parameters:
      entityCode - the unique identifier code for this entity
      entityName - the display name of this entity

  • Method Details

    • getMultiYearEntities

      public static List<MultiYearEntity> getMultiYearEntities()
      Returns the complete list of all multi-year entities.
      Returns:
      a list containing all entity entries created

    • findMultiYearEntityWithCode

      public static MultiYearEntity findMultiYearEntityWithCode(String entityCode)
      Searches for and returns an entity with the specified entity code.
      Parameters:
      entityCode - the entity code to search for
      Returns:
      the matching MultiYearEntity, or null if no entity with that code exists

    • getTotalExpensesOfEntityPerYear

      public Map<Integer,Long> getTotalExpensesOfEntityPerYear()
      Calculates the total expenses (regular + public investment) for this entity broken down by year.
      Returns:
      a map where keys are years and values are total expense amounts for each year

    • getTotalRegularExpensesOfEntityPerYear

      public Map<Integer,Long> getTotalRegularExpensesOfEntityPerYear()
      Calculates the regular (non-investment) expenses for this entity broken down by year.
      Returns:
      a map where keys are years and values are regular expense amounts for each year

    • getTotalPublicInvestmentExpensesOfEntityPerYear

      public Map<Integer,Long> getTotalPublicInvestmentExpensesOfEntityPerYear()
      Calculates the public investment expenses for this entity broken down by year.
      Returns:
      a map where keys are years and values are public investment expense amounts for each year

      public String getEntityCode()
      Returns the unique identifier code for this entity.

      the entity code

      public List<MultiYearBudgetExpense> getMultiYearExpensesOfEntity()
